name: Ideagen PLC
description: Ideagen PLC is a leading provider of governance, risk, and compliance (GRC) software. Founded in 2012 and headquartered in Nottingham, UK, the company specializes in software solutions that help organizations enhance their operational efficiency and maintain regulatory compliance. Ideagen’s flagship product, Q-Pulse, is widely used across various sectors including healthcare, manufacturing, and finance to streamline document control, manage audits, and ensure risk management. The company also offers a suite of complementary products that foster collaboration and improve data management across enterprises. Ideagen is committed to delivering innovative solutions that empower organizations to manage their risks effectively while promoting a culture of compliance and accountability. By leveraging advanced technologies, including cloud computing and data analytics, Ideagen helps its clients to not only meet but exceed regulatory requirements and industry standards. With a strong focus on customer success and a global presence, Ideagen continues to expand its footprint in the GRC market, catering to organizations of all sizes, from SMEs to multinational corporations.
